termsAndPrivacy.termsOfServiceDescription: By using our Ask Me Anything (AMA) service, you agree to these terms. We provide this service as is, and we make no promises or guarantees about this service.
termsAndPrivacy.dataDeletionDescription: You can request the deletion of your data through the following email: vitor@vhrbo.tech requesting the deletion of your data. Once you delete your data, all rooms created by you will be deleted, including all questions and answers.
termsOfServiceList: You must Continue with a social account to use the full features of this service. We use OAuth (Google or Facebook) to authenticate users. We do not store any passwords, and we do not have access to your social account passwords.
You agree to use the service for creating and participating in AMA rooms responsibly.
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our discretion.
privacyPolicyDescription: We use HTTP-only cookies for authentication purposes. These cookies are automatically deleted after 24 hours or when you log out.
We collect and store your name, email, and profile picture to provide our service. We do not share this information with third parties.
We collect and store the following information:
privacyPolicyList: Your account information (name, email, and optional bio)
Rooms you create (associated with your account), including room names and creation dates
Messages/Questions you post in rooms (not associated with your account, made anonymously)
Your reactions to messages (you can see the total number of reactions, but can only see your own reaction)
privacyPolicyAdditional: We use this information to provide and improve our service. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for any purposes.
Our service uses WebSocket connections for real-time updates. This allows us to provide you with instant notifications about new messages and room updates.
